2027280.name: The Haunted Library
2027280.description:
Story

the game takes place in an old VHS recording of the main character Thomas, who inherited an old house with a library from his dead father. At night, he hears strange sounds coming from the library, along with Thomas you will find out what is in the house with Thomas.

Features

  • Explore the house
  • Find the hidden objects
  • Solve puzzles
  • Find out what caused the events
  • Record as mutch evidence as you posibly can
2027280.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
